name: TetriDrop
description:
A puzzle game made for the Mini Jam #67 - "Game must not contain any enemies"

The game is a crossover between Tetris and Magical Drop. Try to get the best score by clearing same-colored lines.

  • ← and → to MOVE
  • SPACE to pick / drop a piece
  • F to ask for more lines

Handmade C++ engine using  OpenGL for graphics as well as the SDL2 and nothing's stb libraries.
